document_data.name: Bristar
document_data.Etymology: The name "Bristar" is a contraction of the name "Brightstar".
document_data.Activities: The elves of Bristar were particularly protective of [[Lake Eredruie]], a sacred pool of water whose waters had healing properties to elves and [[half-elves]].
document_data.History: Following the great [[Retreat]] of the elves to the island nation of [[Evermeet]], the elves of Bristar that chose to stay on the mainland allied themselves with [[Deepingdale]] over the [[Elven Court]]â€“aligned settlement of [[Semberholme]]. This decision added to the community's strength and prosperity in the wake of an overall decreased elven population.
